Package itunesq

Class PlaylistCollection

java.lang.Object
itunesq.PlaylistCollection
public final class PlaylistCollection extends Object
Class that performs various operations on a collection of playlists.

This is a final class consisting entirely of static methods.

Author:
Jon

  • Constructor Details

    • PlaylistCollection

      public PlaylistCollection()

  • Method Details

    • initializeLogging

      public static void initializeLogging()
      Initializes logging. This is called once at application initialization.

    • modifyIgnoredPlaylists

      public static void modifyIgnoredPlaylists​(org.apache.pivot.collections.List<String> prevIgnoredPlaylists, org.apache.pivot.collections.List<String> newIgnoredPlaylists)
      Modifies the ignored status for all playlists according to the preferences. This is called if the ignored preferences are changed.
      Parameters:
      prevIgnoredPlaylists - list of ignored playlists before being changed
      newIgnoredPlaylists - list of ignored playlists after being changed

    • isPlaylistIgnored

      public static boolean isPlaylistIgnored​(String playlistName)
      Determines if a playlist should be ignored.
      Parameters:
      playlistName - name of the playlist to check
      Returns:
      true if the playlist should be ignored, otherwise false

    • postProcessPlaylists

      public static void postProcessPlaylists()
      Performs post-processing on all playlists.

    • markBypassedPlaylists

      public static void markBypassedPlaylists()
      Finds and marks all playlists that are bypassed by user preferences.

    • updateTrackPlaylistInfo

      public static void updateTrackPlaylistInfo()
      Updates the track playlist info for all playlists that are not ignored. The playlist info consists of the playlist name and a bypassed indicator.
